name: Tales Of Guy
description:
Tales Of Guy is a real-time strategy board game based on a child's game, tag. 


The game features one of the adventures of the batrachian Guy, fighting for the restoration of the sacred Temple of the Lotus under attack by the dangerous Grogg.

Three weeks ago I took the crazy challenge to start creating a video game without any knowledge of programming or in drawing and animation.

However, I am proud to present to you my very first project: Tales Of Guy. With this build, you will have the opportunity to test my very first game. I hope you will have a good gaming experience, don't hesitate to give me feedback and suggestions, I will be happy to discuss it with you.
